channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Colin Cowherd: CFP Committee Decision-Making 'Is Absolutely Ridiculous'
item.description: Colin Cowherd is left confounded by the College Football Playoff committees' factors for determining its field.

item.description: The 2026 FIFA World Cup Draw is complicated. USMNT legend Alexi Lalas breaks down everything you need to know before Friday's event.

item.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 14: Lines, Spreads for all 14 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for every NFL Week 14 matchup.

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Dodgers, Red Make Key Re-Signings
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: AD disputes Kiffin's version of exit from Ole Miss
item.description: Ole Miss athletic director Keith Carter is disputing Lane Kiffin's version of events surrounding the coach's controversial exit for LSU.

item.title: What now for Chris Paul and the Clippers? We answered six questions on the stunning news
item.description: What's next for Chris Paul? What about the Clippers, who are struggling badly? We answered five questions about this big roster shake-up.

item.title: NHL Awards Watch: MacKinnon jumps to massive lead in MVP race
item.description: We polled PHWA voters to find out who's ahead in the major races -- and some clear favorites have emerged.
